name: deadrun
description:
Your life is currency. Literally.

Death has a debt to pay, and he needs your soul to pay for it.

Avoid him at all costs. Find the exit. Escape.

Controls

* WASD: move
* Mouse: look around
* F: fullscreen

Browser Support

Tested in:

* Chrome 73.0.3683.103
* Firefox 66.0.3
